name: co-Up
description:
A funny cooperative climbing game with split screen that simulates the Game Boy cable link feature. You can play with a good friend or loved one through several stages with different difficulty levels and many obstacles. 

Controls:

F2 / Toggle music

Esc / Restart stage

Player 1

Up, space bar / Jump

Left, right / Move

Player 2

W, left control / Jump

A, d / Move
